Name: CAPP Food Pantry

CAPP's Food Pantry currently serves over 600 families from the Providence community in the 02907 zip code area. The Food Pantry provides proteins, vegetables, bread and non-perishable food when available. Residents must complete an application before picking up food and re-certify yearly.

Wednesdays 10:00am-2:00pm Food Distribution/Pickup

Name: Lighthouse Community Development Corporation

Name: Good Neighbors
Description: We have been in operation since 1990 in Bristol, RI, relocating to Riverside, RI in November, 2014. We operate a soup kitchen, food pantry, day shelter, and provide many other necessary services. Residents of Providence, East Providence, Bristol, Warren, Barrington, Portsmouth and Tiverton can receive groceries once per month.  Everyone is welcome, regardless of income.
